content.detailedDescription:
Unfortiunately i could not see a solid object, other than a upright cylidrical looking flashing - multi-coloured light.  but it was big and extremely bright.
i work for a motel in vernon, bc, and spend a lot of time outside in the parking lot during my evening shifts. i have seen strange things in the skies here since may, 2008, so i started carrying my small digital camera everywhere i go.  i live in a condo attached to the motel, and this particular night was the second in a row of seeing this object, so i ran to grab my video camera, (which i had ready to go just in case), and starting filming.
i will attach a link to my posting on youtube, since it would take forever to upload again - its a 222 mb avi file.  its just easier to give you a link if thats okay:-)

http://youtube.Com/watch?V=7kuwsuqe8au

have a great day, 

gary :-)
content.summary: Large high alititude upright cylidrical looking flashing - multi-coloured light

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home playing frisbee with my youngest son (12) and we hear a loud jet in the air, it was louder than usual and i caught a glimpse of it and it appeared to be a jet and it was low in the horizon. we did not see much of it but i was assuming it was a military jet because they will buzz through  now and then. maybe every once in a blue moon, but there is an airport about 30 minutes away.

10 minutes later, my wife was driving back from her family reunion in dearborn and she called me on the phone as my son and i were walking back in the house. she was trying to explain to me that she is looking at three intense spots in the sky that is multi-colored lights.  almost like a transparent smudge but it's appears to be long oval spots.

she told me i should go on top of the house and see if i can see it. i did just that and could not see past the large trees.  so, my wife came home and drove me towards the main road so i can see what she was talking about.  right then, we only says this faint yellowish, read, light greenish light.

i managed to take a picture of it. this elongated oval light seem to just hover in the misty clouds.  just one, not three.  the light just eventually seemed to dematerialized or should i say it look like it slowly winked out.

i have two pictures of it i managed to take before it did wink out, the sun was to the right of this picture, but the sun is not in the picture.  this was looking wnw from us23 and exit 41.

not sure if this was a ufo or some type of light anomaly we've never seem before. never the less, it was strange.  no sudden movements from what i saw.

i don't have a fancy camera, it's just a olympus fe-100. i'm not the expert, so here are the pictures.
content.summary: Bright oval shaped light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While looking for my boomerang in some tall grass i found what i initially believed to be an egg.  it was about the size of a chicken's egg but was sort of squishy.  it was mostly white with a light grey mottled color and had a small, shriveled umbilical about one inch long.  i took it to the house and set up a cement block and brought out my dissecting kit.

with a scalpal i cut into it to reveal a skin about one mm thick or a little less revealing what looked like fish flesh.  you could see an extremely fine tracery of capillaries and it exuded a small amount of a somewhat sticky and clear fluid.  cutting through that revealed a central 'core' of a brilliant orange, three fingered arrangement that clasped a blue sphere.  the orange and blue portions were crennelated much as brain matter it and also showed a very fine tracery of capillaried.

my mom called me into the house for lunch and upon returning to the front yard i discovered about 10 or 12 cats eating everything but the 'core'!

very disappointed (as i knew my neighbors were both biologists at the local university) i decided to plant the core in a small pot of soil and put it inside the house.

about seven days later i realized that that move did not make any sense and took the pot outside and with a spoon carefully scraped the soil out.  there was nothing to be found, not even a wet spot.

i've been wanting to re-create this object with the appropriately colored clays for years and can do so, just haven't done so yet.
content.summary: Dissection of possible embryonic entity

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of the house looking east and past two fenced grass fields was a stand of pine trees.  hovering maybe 100 feet directly over the trees was a brilliant, shiny gold disc against a beautiful, cloud-free blue sky.  i observed it for around one minute, all the while it made no sound and emitted no exhaust.  no markings were observable.  i slowly backed up towards the front door where i knew my mother was inside.  i had this strange feeling that it was watching me watch it.  my uppermost thought was to let my mom know so she could see also see it.  i backed up until i was at the foot of the front porch stairs (about 4 stairs).  in less than 2 seconds i had sprung up the stairs, yanked open the screen door and yelled to mom to come outside as there was a ufo to be seen.  i turned my head to the left and the disc was gone.  there was not a sign in the sky such as contrail or quickly diminishing object.  it wasn't until 10 or 15 years later that it occurred to me that its quickest means of disappearance was to simply land.
content.summary: Brilliant gold disc

content.detailedDescription: Last evening 4/23/08 at 10:15pm i was eating dinner outside at ricks boatyard cafe located at eagle creek lake on the nw side of indianapolis located in marion county. most of the people were gone as we sat on the restaurants outdoor patio with my wife and two other friends finishing up our dinner conversation. my seat was facing north at the table when i noticed a bright light in the northern sky. we are close to a local airport and also the indianapolis international airport and love to watch planes as we sail around on the lake. i thought it was a plane coming in for landing. i then noticed another bright light appear very close in fact what looked like too close for two planes to be on an evening approach. suddenly the lights disappeared, i said nothing to my wife or guests and kept looking in the same direction. then they reappeared again first one light then two with a third light appearing just to the east, i told my wife and guests to look into the sky and tell me if they are seeing what i am seeing. we watched as the lights disappeared and i told them to keep watching and that they might reappear. we watched and sure enough they did reappear only this time there were 4 of them coming on one at a time. the two central lights appeared again and in the same location as before, then the eastern or port side light came on then the western or starboard side light came on forming what looked like a very large triangle shape. if i were to guess distance i would say about a mile across from the port to starboard light. we heard no noise, and the lights did not appear to be moving only coming on and going off. after they went out this time they did not reappear but we all had a fun time watching and trying to figure out what it could be? weather conditions were good, skies were clear at this time of night with many stars visible and in sight.
content.summary: L

content.detailedDescription:
My three sisters, mother, step-father and myself (12 years of age) were pulling out of the driveway on the way to church when i noticed a silver disc zipping overhead.  i alerted everyone that 'there's a ufo overhead'.  we stopped the car and everyone got out of the car to observe.  there was a scattering of clouds overhead that had to be around 1-1/2 to 2 miles high and the craft was flying just underneath.  it had to be close to one mile high and was travelling from about 30 degrees off the horizon to the around 30 degrees above the opposite horizon in about one second.  it would then make a return shot to the other horizon without losing any momentum.  it wasn't re-tracing its path but just going extreme distances at extreme speed back and forth.  we watched it for around eight minutes until it was decided that we just had to get going and continue on to church.

it was sort of a dull silver color and if it was closer it could have been a shinier silver but from our vantage point it was sort of a lead color.  also, it wasn't close enough to discern any markings, apertures or other details, just the atypical disc shape.  additionally, we didn't notice any noise or exhaust.
content.summary: Silver disc about 1 mile high flying very fast

content.detailedDescription: Driving up a quiet road on the edge of a huge hill and looked up to see this strange triangular object in the sky, the sky was blue and clear in the late afternoon. we stopped in a driveway i hopped out of the vehicle and got to stare up at it for at least 2 minutes before it slowly started to move away it was completely stationary until i got out and stared at it. we tried to follow it then it started to move quicker then just dissapeared in the blink of an eye. this was one of my best experiences of my life, what a sense of hope you get from being right there looking at something of such a high degree of technology. i knew exactly what it was when i saw it i am very intelligent and understand many things. we are not the only life form in the universe this was very convincing experience. i felt very happy and relieved that i could see such an event before my time on this earth was gone. i wish i could have had a camera but i remember it like it was yesterday.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black, triangular, lights on outer edges of the craft, silent, slowly rotating,

content.detailedDescription:
My 12 year old son was sitting in my truck which is back in the drive way faceing east,says he witness a blue hazy ball of light floting about 3 feet off the ground come out of nowhere,and race down the street,and around the cornor.
now i know one thing in my 42 years of life is that, thay don't like cold weather? that's all i'm going to say about that.
content.summary: Blue ball about half the size of car.

content.detailedDescription: In back seet of of car while parents were in front not paying attention to child. me in back seet. i watched as it flew over head. it spun a couple of time while maintaining a straight course. it was amazeing. not saying it was alien. just saying like always our government is hideing important technology from its people. i was in craryvill ny columbia county when it happened. i was watching the skies when it happened. it was so close thats what made me notice it.The craft its self was black. i was happy at the time because it made me relize i wasnt alone. but to day i relize its just our government hideing secrets such as technology we as a people could use for good.
content.summary: Triangle mabe 500 yards directly above six white lights 2 lights on each side of vessel. flew with zero sound.

content.detailedDescription:
i recieved a call  to go to alert status. i was active air force as a weapons tech. i was trained in nuclear and stategic muntions and  delivery. i was trained in tac but was transfered to sac  after my return from sea(south east asia).
i was called to alert status, which means i must leave my domicile  (in brilmey) and proceed to my duty station at kinchloe afb.
i took the back roads to achieve better time. this short cut took me through farmland, in the middle of no subdivisions or close homes.
as i proceeded down this road i came across a saucer shaped object in the farm field. it hovered below tree top level. 30 feet or so off the ground. i stopped my vehicle and watched the craft. it made no noise and was silver metallic. it was no aircraft that i was trained to recognize. i stopped my vehicle and got partically out the car. i had one foot in and one foot out the vehicle. i watched the craft. it was dark as you could be imagined at 3-4 am in the morning in the northeran latitudes. i flashed my vehicle lights off then on. the craft turned a  cowling light that shone to the ground, on then off. i repeated the same process, the hovering craft did the same. i waited several minutes. then looking off to my right i notice two more craft just past a tree line perpendicular to me lifting off the ground beyond the tree line. there where three craft total. as the other two craft climbed to tree top level i realized that i could stay no longer as i would be awol if not there with in the time limit of alert status.
very few people know of this.
content.summary: Active  air force called to alert status

content.detailedDescription:
I know it sounds insane, and yet i'm never been prone to delusions of this nature. i mean, we all have our hang-ups and personality flaws, but come on,tentacles? i would be totally content to accept that i could just be going a little off my rocker, if it weren't for one thing: i've been meeting other people who see them, as well as corresponding with a photographer who calls his youtube channel "disguise of texas". he also sees the tentacles, and they are visible at times in his time lapsed videos on youtube.

usually, they move through the sky at a dead crawl, undulating so slowly that their movement can easily be ignored by the unobservant. the tentacles can be seen like a smooth, dark shadow within the clouds. if you watch this smooth, dark shadow 

i'll never forget the moment i realized the startling truth. i was lying happily on the grass in the shade of an old oak tree at the barton springs pool one afternoon, not a care in the world (which, by the way, is how i spend most of my time these days). although the temperature had rissen above 100 degrees that day, i had been swimming in the 70 degree water on and off all day and so was not at all affected by the sweltering heat. as i lie observing the strange cloud formations in the upper atmosphere, which has been a habit of mine since i first began to notice them a little over a year ago (for all i know, they could have been there for quite a while longer), it suddenly became clear to me that the slender, smooth tubes that i could see running through the cloud bank i was looking at were actually tentacles, connected to something resembling a triangular body.... more on this later.

can you see the repeated shapes in these sunset photos that i found on line? the huge triangular heads and the eyes?  i see these all the time at sunset. the tentacles arent too visible in these pictures.
content.summary: Huge translucent tentacled creatures in the sky above austin (go outside: 3:30-5:30 am!)

content.detailedDescription:
i recieved a call  to go to alert status. i was active air force as a weapons tech. i was trained in nuclear and stategic muntions and  delivery. i was trained in tac but was transfered to sac  after my return from sea(south east asia).
i was called to alert status, which means i must leave my domicile  (in brilmey) and proceed to my duty station at kinchloe afb.
i took the back roads to achieve better time. this short cut took me through farmland, in the middle of no subdivisions or close homes.
as i proceeded down this road i came across a saucer shaped object in the farm field. it hovered below tree top level. 30 feet or so off the ground. i stopped my vehicle and watched the craft. it made no noise and was silver metallic. it was no aircraft that i was trained to recognize. i stopped my vehicle and got partically out the car. i had one foot in and one foot out the vehicle. i watched the craft. it was dark as you could be imagined at 3-4 am in the morning in the northeran latitudes. i flashed my vehicle lights off then on. the craft turned a  cowling light that shone to the ground, on then off. i repeated the same process, the hovering craft did the same. i waited several minutes. then looking off to my right i notice two more craft just past a tree line perpendicular to me lifting off the ground beyond the tree line. there where three craft total. as the other two craft climbed to tree top level i realized that i could stay no longer as i would be awol if not there with in the time limit of alert status.
very few people know of this.
content.summary: Active  air force called to alert status

content.detailedDescription:
Observing conditions: approx. 65 degrees, calm, clear. no fog or cloud tendrils. one of the best nights for viewing in the last month.

as i do almost nightly, i was in my driveway watching for meteors. i was observing the eastern quadrant of the sky between the constellations perseus and sagittarius. jupiter, the brightest object, was low on the horizon in the constellation sagittarius. 

 i first noticed a flashing out of the corner of my eye. at first, i thought it might be a meteor. the brightness was about the same magnitude as an average meteor, my estimate is magnitude 3.  i then focused my attention upon the object.

 there were three outstanding characteristics of the object(s).
(1) the blinking lights 
    the object appeared to be a mass of very small, tightly packed, bright lights.  the lights were blinking on and off, in unison, at a rate much faster than commercial airliners. i estimate 5-7 times/second. i estimate a number greater than 20. i could not count the number due to the small size of the individual lights and the short length of the viewing period. the magnitude of the blinking was consistant for the first 7 seconds or so. it dimmed to nearly invisible within 1/2 second, regained it's former magnitude for the nest few seconds, then faded and was no longer observable. i estimate that at their maximun brightness, they reached a magnitude 3.

(2) the shape 
     the shape was indistinct. i could not tell the depth. the mass of lights  appeared as if they were on a single surface. it was not a cloud of lights with a determinate depth.

(3) size
   the size of the mass was about the size of a dime held at arms length.

(4) the duration
    i estimate approx. 10 seconds total. the first seven seconds fully observable, then fading to near invisibility, back to the original magnitude for a few seconds, then fading to invisibility.

 (5) direction of travel
   with a ruler held at arms length, (approx. 2'-9") from the eye, i estimate the mass of lights traveled approx. 6 inches across the sky.
content.summary: Very tight group of small blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: Mother and i were driving south on us 1 to barefoot bay, florida... on a return trip from melbourne.  we saw several lights in sky (perhaps as far as cocoa beach) moving from different directions.  once "grouped" they appeared to head south.   within minutes they were already what appeared to be as far as miami.   they were at high altitude and at first i thought it was a commercial plane.  the speed heading south was tremendously fast.   very unsure about date of sighting.   was two or maybe three months ago. (late april or may of 2008)
content.summary: Sighting of fast moving lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: Was woken up by cat and went out to smoke as i went outside i noticed how clear the sky was as i was looking i noticed a shooting star (or i thought it was) within 3 seconds i noticed an object extremely far away traveling very quickly from south to north as i watched it i noticed it had a half circle of red lights blinking from right to left and a bright red light on the point on the rear . as i watched the object i knew it was to fast and to high to be an airplane,as it passed over where i was standing the red lights in front turned yellow and the tail light was off .  i ran to the front of the house to view it as it traveled and it went straight up and dissapeared.    i am very confused about what i saw. i realize that it would be arrogant for us to think we are alone in the universe but never really 100% that we were being visited by other life forms
content.summary: Was smoking and seen a craft

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived home from my father's house, who only lives the next block up.  i pulled into the yard and parked the car.  my son climbed across the seat and sat into my lap.  as i opened the car door i happened to glance up and noticed something flying over the house.  it was very low and  seemed to be very wide.  i could distinctly see two white lights, one on each end, running horizontal and directly in the middle was a red flashing light.  the white lights were constant and the red light blinked slowly.  i watched it as it seemed to glide over the house and past the tree line. it was heading in a northwest direction. there was no sound, no noise at all.  there was complete silence.  it's movement made me uneasy as well.  it didn't seem to be in a hurry, it just seemed to glide so easily through the air.  i have grown up in and around the local military bases all my life.  i have never been more than 30 miles from ft. bragg, pope air force base and simmons airfield.  i am used to and very familiar with the aircraft that flies in and out of this area.  this was not like any i had seen or heard before, or should i say didn't hear.  i couldn't make out the body of the craft due to a street light in my yard putting off so much light.  my heart just stopped, i felt very anxious.  i rushed my son into the house and then ran back out the door and into the street.  i could not see it.  i went back into the house and got my son to bed.  i tried to go to sleep myself but found myself feeling so uneasy. i almost felt violated.
content.summary: Craft flew silently over house.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night my friends and i decided to go to the hot springs in ojai, and after about an hour of star gazing an object caught my eye. off in the distance over santa barbara a pulsating light was flashing red, green, and white. at first i thought it was a airplane, but i quickly realized it was dancing around in an erratic manner yet staying in the same relative area in the sky. zig zags, circles, and different light variations made me and my friends positive it was not an airplane or helicopter. 

as creepy as it was i could not look away, so i continued to stare at it for the next 30 minutes, watching it dance and slowly get smaller. the object slowly moved lower on the horizon until it slipped behind some trees.
content.summary: My friends and i saw a pulsating object flashing red, green, and white dance around in the sky doing zig zags and loops, but also staying put in one spot from time to time

content.detailedDescription: My nephew and i were on our way home from a youth meeting at church on a wednesday evening during summertime about 7pm. we were driving north on bumby ave. just past grant st. when i looked out the passenger window to the east (for no reason) and above the small orange groove (now a subdivision) i show an object hovering just above the trees. i slowed down and calmly asked my nephew of 11 years to look out his passenger window and describe what he saw. he immediately turned back to me with a scared look on his face (jaw dropped). i said please look again and tell me what you see so i can make sure i am not seeing things. he described the same object i saw. we only saw a side view of the object. the body was cigar shaped and appeared metallic, there was a clear see through bubble on top center, there were lights along the midsection of the main cigar shaped body and there was no noise coming from it. i knew this was not a helicopter or airplane. it was in a location where jets normally use (glide path) to land at orlando international airport. the object was not moving in anyway. just stayed hovering above the trees. i never stopped the car. when i got to the next intersection bumby st and kaley, i made a quick u-turn to go back and get a better look. my nephew kept asking me to just keeping heading home but i said i must see what this thing was. but it was gone and no evidence it was ever there. i was never scared, more curious than anything. strangely there were no other cars or people around. i honestly do not remember the drive home. at the time i lived with my parents at meridale st. and illinois ave. orlando, fl. 32803. from where the sighting was to home should have only taken 15-20 minutes but we did not get home until approximately 9pm. as soon as my mother saw us she knew we were upset by something. we told my mother what happened. i think my mother believed us because of how unnerved we were. i have not told many people about this for fear they will think i was some crazy person. to this day my nephew refuses to speak about it. unfortunately i have no other evidence that this ever happened besides my nephew.
content.summary: Nephew and i saw unknown cigar shaped object above orange grove.

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for a ride to go to church at about 8:30 am or so on the morning on july 6th, 2008. i was waiting outside my apartment complex for my ride when i looked up towards the sky to the north of my location. i saw something hovering there for almost the whol;e time i was out there. i am not sure how long i was out there but between the time i went out & saw it & the time my ride got there it just sat there. it looked almost like a hot air balloon but it just hovered there. at one point, on the way to church after my ride got me, i still saw it in the sky but it had moved. it didn't act like a hot air ballon. it was like a dark blue object against the clear blue sky with the sunshit bright in the sky to my right. it didn't act like a hot air ballon. i have seen those on tv. i would be like getting in the car & talkingto my ride & then glancing up to see it every so often. it was weird.
content.summary: Saw something that hovered in the air

content.detailedDescription: Star-like object came out of the sky from the east and moved west over the mississippi river. it then continued back east and then back west over the river. left again towards the east and stopped directly south and then disappeared.
content.summary: Star-like objects moving east to west

content.detailedDescription: This is a video of unknown aircraft sent to me by my nephew in mexico. i don't know who the person is that took the video so i'm sending it to you to see if you can determine if its real or fake. if it is real i would like to know what country has such aircraft or where they are made.  please let me know what you find out i would really appreciated. thanks
content.summary: Video of unknown aircraft

content.detailedDescription: This event took place many years ago i was probably 10yrs old or so i had been visting my grandma with my mother and sister in mogadore ohio. that night i was siting on a picnic table with my sister and a few of my cousins we where all facing the same direction toward a line of pine trees that was about 25ft away i remember looking down the line at all of there faces when something caught my attention i turned toward the trees and right on top of the tree i saw the object i looked at in long enough to see it was coming right toward us at a very slow speed i only saw half of the object it was circlular there was a red light in the center there where also white lights brighter than the red one that seemed to be moving around the bottom of the craft and it was completely silent i just got up and started running toward the house i dont know if i screamed or what but everyone sitting there with me just followed me into the house the younger kids at that point were crying i was trying to explain to the 4 or 5 adults that where in the house that we had just seen a ufo of course did not belive but not one of them ran out to try to see it they where scarred of course they where saying it could have been a plane, the goodyear blimp, the only problem with that is that we whould have heard either of those from a good distance away and would have not been so startled.  this object was right on top of the trees and was totally silent. i have not been able to forget this incident i have contacted the younger of the cousins but they do not remeber. but i have yet to talk to one that was the same age i was at the time so i do not know if she remembers.  i just wanted to share my experience maybe someone saw the same thing i did on that night.
content.summary: Object just appeared out of no where it was circular a red light in the middle and white lights around it

content.detailedDescription: I wish to be anonymous, but i thought it important to report this incident.  on july 3rd 2008, i and my daughter (an adult) were returning home.  the sky was very clear and stary, and my daughter just happened to look up while i was unlocking the front door. she remarked "ma, is it my imagination, or is that star moving?"  i looked up to where she was looking and sure enough it was moving.  this could not have been any plane, because it was obviously near or in the outer atmosphere due to the extreme height of the object.  it appeared to look like the rest of the stars.  the object moved in a straight line and "parked next to what i think was venus since it was a very bright star (sorry, but i'm not an astrologer) and the object seemed to fade in and out then it suddenly took off in another direction with such a speed it was unbeleivable.  at that time the object disapeared, but about seven more suddnenly appeared and were moving around each other and then split apart into different directions, also traveling at unbeleivable speeds.  then, about ten more objects joined the first objects and they alternated "flying" around and moving in various directions (including at sudden right angles) for about two hours. we sat on the porch and watched this activity until they all suddenly shot off in a cluster toward an eastern direction and disappeared.  while we were watching these objects manuver, they too were fading in and out at times. i wish to add that the rates of speed were so fantastic, and i know this because, it it a great deal of distance from one point to another in the sky, and it took the objects a fraction of a second to cover these distances. i want to stress that these absolutely were not planes, as we live in flight paths for both commercial and military aircraft, and both kinds were flying over, and despite how high the planes were they were no where near the distance that the objects were, nor do they act in anyway the same; and they definately were not stars.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Large fleet of ufo's making manuvers

content.detailedDescription:
A buddy and i were driving back from danville, il on st rd 26.  i started spacing off and noticed some orange lights in the sky.  they didn't really register with me until my friend noticed them and said they were going out, moving, and fading back in (staying stationary while lit).

this brought it to my attention immediately, and we began to look at the sky for more strangeness.  about five minutes later, a light shows up ahead of us.  i thought it was the tower up ahead, until it faded out and lit back up in a location directly to the left.  we counted it doing this six times, and didn't see it any more that night.  

honestly, i believe there have to be aliens, but i'm not stir crazy about it, and will try to explain it away as this, that, or the other.

i couldn't explain this.  the lights were stationary while lit, and as soon as they faded away, another one lit up in another location near it.
content.summary: Stationary orange lights fading out and reappearing in another location

content.detailedDescription: Looking west...Saw a star-like ufo hovering over the mississippi river. it stayed there for 20 minutes and then disappeared.
content.summary: Star-like ufo hovered for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
While driving east on i-10 freeway, i observed a very shocking sight over the mountains to my north. while watching it i pointed it out to my wife and daughter and looked for a place to safely pull over. i stopped at a wide spot on the eastbound onramp from 4th street to i-10. i got out and saw a dirigible shaped ufo moving from behind the peak of a mountain at a distance of about 13 miles. i am a military and commercial pilot with over 25 years of experience. the object was so huge it was impossible for me to see what i was observing from as it was approximately 1/2 mile (3000 ft) in length and 400 to 450 feet in diameter. this is incredible to see something so huge in the air) the ends were hemispherical in shape and ever-so-slightly eliptical in shape. the surface was as shiny as a milar balloon. the visibilty, this morning, was between 50-70 miles minimum as i could clearly see the peaks of mt san jacinto and mt. san gregornio, to the east, and there were no clouds a all from horizon to horizon. in miltary terms it was severe-clear. i could see in the reflection, of the surface of the object, movement of terrain below the object. i could see the terrain with roads or gullies and other objects reflected. the strange thing is that the ground reflections were being superimposed on the upper surfaces of the object and the sky was being reflected on the lower surfaces of the object. this would be exactly opposite for any reflective surface to do and had to be projected by technology, unknown at the time, on the opposite sides of the craft. the curved ends of the surface distorted the images as any curved surface would but the reflections were clear, as if in a mirror, not a polished metalic/aluminum skin. the craft was flying level and quite slow - perhaps 30-35 mph and did not maneuver from a straight course. we watched the object move left to right until the rear end cleared the peak on the left and then traveled the distance between the two major peaks where it started to disappear behind the right-hand peak. we watched it until it completely disappeared behind the peak on the east. 

we were enroute to my wife's mother's home for mother's day and i advised them of the sightings and saw their reaction of wonder. i was reluctant to discuss it with anyone else, at the time, due to the incredulity of the enormous size of the object and probability of becoming ridiculed. i am a retired army officer with 21 years service. i am a trained observer, as an officer and a pilot, and i know what i saw was absolutely not man- made. it had no apparent means of propulsion, left no sign it had passed, and did not appear again to me. recently i witnessed video footage of a sighting over colorado of a similarly shaped object. the size of the object was approximately a ratio of seven to one as to length and width. the surface was perfectly smooth - without distortion - and cylindrical in shape except for the ends. the difference between this one and the colorado video is that the one i saw was mirror-surfaced and the one in the colorado sighting appeared white against a blue sky. the ratio was so similar in both that i felt compelled to report this to you as it might fit into other sightings of the time and provide a new impression. i have since been back to the spot and have taken gps readings at the place we observed it from and a magnetic azimuth of the direction to the object which i have recorded. 

i have only had one other sighting of a ufo, in my life, as a boy scout in idaho in oct. 1956 and that sighting was documented by the goc (civil ground observer corps)and us air force operations i was working for as a volunteer. i would be happy to discuss this one also if interested. it was declared a ufo by the af observers on duty and f-89 aircraft were scrambled from fairchild afb to attempt an intercept with it, over washington state, a few minutes following our sighting in boise.
content.summary: I & my wife and daughter watched a gigantic ufo over the mountains north of us on a very clear day.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my front yard looking north, when i saw what looked like an aiplane landing lights, but it was odd because the jets do not usually approch from that direction.  the light was  a circle, with a red and white cast to it. i did not pay much attention to it untill i noticed that it flickerd off then on again brighter.  then  few seconds later a scecond one appeared as the first one flicker off.  they were right beside one another. then one, two and three spehers appeared in a diaganle formation from left to right, the first appeared flickering on, then off, then the second one flickerd on the off, and so on.  i really can't explain the way they turned on and off, but to say they flickerd. then  later on they would appear indivually turning on and off.  then i got my bonoculers, to look and the spears appeard very small and red in color and almost diamond shape. one light would sperate into two and then a third one would appear sperate from the other two, that just had sperated. after that i stayed outside for approx 1 hour after i saw the last one and they never appeared again.  i got a compass to see what direction i was looking and it was right on north then i log the time. just has a side note, i saw these lights last year at the approx time, date and location in the sky. 

if someone would like to contact me i can give a better explanation
content.summary: Bright red lights turning on and off then sperating over marion county

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful cloudless day. i was in the garage looking out toward the northeast (north of auburn) just thinking that this is quite a great day when movement in the sky caught my attention. i saw an object flying due east and level. there was no sound and i saw neither props nor jet engines on it. it reflected the sun off its surface and appeared roundish or disc shaped. it then started flying in a tight circle-i've never seen a plane that was capable of doing such a thing. then, from the north, it was  joined by a second like object. the two circled each other for about a minute and then just disappeared from sight in the same instant still circling each other. i think they were discs as opposed to round because they would appear much thinner when making banking turns in the circle thus narrowing their reflective surface facing the sun.
content.summary: 2 disc shaped objects met high in ne sky circled & disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Ufosnw.Com/sighting_reports/2008/laxca04282008/laxca04282008.Htm


this linq has the story!  the video is attached.  it was wierd real!
content.summary: Triangle cloaking over lax airport

content.detailedDescription: Late aug or early sept 1974 my friend and i saw a very big ufo hover over mountain creek lake in dallas.  we were close to it, until we left.  then mountain creek lake quite hilly and wooded with winding roads and had very private areas, yet it had and elec power plant on or next to the lake, where swimming is prohibited.  we were riding around the hilly wooded roads as teenagers did then and a car drove fast and crazily past us leaving.  it was so nerve racking on that narrow hilly road that it caused me to pull right into where obviously they had pulled out which was the power plant parking lot.  it was empty and i cannot forget it had amber parking lot lights. it was obviously a nice clear evening or i would not have been out driving at almost 17 yrs old.  immediately we saw it.  you couldn't miss it if you tried.  do not always look up to the skies for ufo's.  i'm telling you it was just there above the lake water. that lake water was at least on one side of the plant, and there this ufo 3 ft above the water between the parking lot where we were and the plant. it was approx 3 ft above the water hovering, if there was a sound it was a low hum only, but it was running because we saw lights.  those strobing or pulsating on this huge craft are mostly what scared us about it. we couldn't understand how something so big could be so still and so close to the water, without plunging below. never in our lives had we seen anything like this.  we stayed concerned as to what could be looking at us behind those lights.  were there windows behind the lights?  i think the lights were around the bottom, but i'd have to be hypnotized to know for sure now, and there could have been port hole windows behind those lights. imagine a house size dull color steel cake cover.  that was how it's body looked and the craft had no visible window, no door, no emblems, letters or number markings from our view. that alarmed me. i wondered out loud how they got in and out of it.  i think it was through the bottom which we could not see because it was so close to the water.  it could be described as a saucer because it was round, but it had great heigth, at least 2 stories high. i remember the plant had a 2nd or 3rd floor big window, and i wondered does anybody in there see it too?  it looked like maybe the staff had gone home but left some lights on inside the plant. i saw no one looking out that window. for a couple of teenagers that had never even discussed ufo's we figured out that it most definitely was a ufo and quickly, and somehow we both just knew it was fueling from the energy currants under the water and able to do this without under.  it could have been communicated through a telepathic message, but that's what we both thought it was doing.  nothing about it's appearance was scary other than what was behind those strobing lights that eerie evening in the vacant amber lit parking lot. this was just a matter of minutes and we got so frightened we left and fast too and i suspect it was for the same reason the that car before us did.  this is absolutely a true story.  this is 2008 and i'm 50.
content.summary: 1974 mountain creek lake - close view of a ufo hovering 3 ft above water fueling up on energy currants
